Articles.Content:
A Hill Billy comes and occupies the hill.

A Hill Billy Hill.

A hill Billy goat chases the hill billy away and now the hill belongs to it.

Billy Goat Hill.

The Billy goat goes at the hill.

Bill Goat Go At Hill

Thermonuclear bomb drops.

My hill.

I strike at the hill with a sickle and a hammer. COMMUNISM

Everybody's collectively owned hill

A collective farm needs a chairman.

A chairman-ruled hill.

I sleep on the hill.

Its 1 am for me right now.

Goodnight

oh yeah my hill

Your squatters rights were rejected and you will be sleeping it off in the drunk tank.

Meanwhile the hill is undergoing a Federal Investigation.

**Bureaucracy Hill.**

The bureaucracy isn't going to be finished anytime soon, (obviously) giving me plenty of time to take the hill for myself and build a fortress around it to enforce me owning the hill.

**MY HILL PROTECTED BY A FORTRESS**

The bureaucracy had already destroyed the foundations of that hill as they are want to do and it crumbled, leaving you with a fortress but no hill.

I sensibly had already built a new hill in another location, free from red tape. I enjoy the view from the balcony of my McMansion on my.

**PRIVATE HILL.**

I leave your private hill alone, and build my own hill.

My hill.

> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, Admiral Fluffy said:
> 
> 
> I leave your private hill alone, and build my own hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My hill.
> 

Such an intelligent person.

Our individual hills.

The bureaucracy initiates an anti-cartel investigation against the pair of hill-developers in Twinhill.

A Suspended Twinhill.

I lay my claim on every possible hill that exists in the universe, intentionally crashing the universe. There is no hills for anybody to own anymore. Now the Universe needs to restart... Restarting... Big bang... The first stars start to form... And look at that! That's the first planet ever! Full of hills free to be claimed by someone. I go find a hill on the planet. I take it for myself.

**MY HILL ON THE FIRST PLANET EVER TO EXIST**

**Edited <time datetime="2021-09-20T11:56:47Z" title="09/20/2021 11:56  AM" data-short="2 yr">September 20, 2021</time> by Maria Sirona**
  
Fixed

But as we all know, Planets are very volatile when first formed and it turns out all your hills are volcanos. Very hot.

I wait a billion years for  some planets to cool and claim a nice mountain.

My Huge Hill..

i nuke it

**my hill**

I aim my anti-laziness ray at ya, and now you are busy doing things like cleaning your house. While you're busy, the hill somehow transforms into...

**MY HILL**

Your Anti-laziness ray explodes, causing you to run around building hill after hill after hill. I claim 1 you have left behind and surround it in a retribution field from RED DWARF. Now any aggresive act will befall the aggressor and not my Hill.

**MY VERY SAFE, NUKE OR ANY OTHER SUPER DANGEROUS WEAPON PROOF HILL.**

Ran out of power.

My hill.
Unpowered Hill

Flipped a coin.

**MY HILL.**

The coin was with two heads and no tails.

Undefined Hill.

I lay claim on the hill and since there's been none for several posts, it is...

**MY HILL**

A disclaimer disclaims the claim.

Unclaimed Hill.

Through some legal wizardry, i make disclaimers illegal. It is still...

**MY HILL**
